data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of the augochlorine bee genus Ceratalictus Moure (Hymenoptera, Apoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coelho, Beatriz W. T., Gonçalves, Rodrigo B. (2010): A taxonomic revision of the augochlorine bee genus Ceratalictus Moure (Hymenoptera, Apoidea). Zootaxa 2675: 1-25, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199190
